text: jPod is a 2006 novel by Douglas Coupland. JPod may also refer to: * jPod (TV series), a 2008 television comedy series based on the novel * JPods, a method of personal transportation * John Podhoretz (born 1961), American writer * James Podsiadly (born 1981), Australian rules footballer * J Pod, a community of southern resident killer whales in the northeastern Pacific Ocean
title: JPod (disambiguation)
